This item may take an additional week to arrive due to COVID-19. We're working closely with our partners to process orders quickly and safety.

content.value:
Our natural wool rugs are expertly hand-knotted by artisans in India, making each rug inherently unique. The wool yarns used in our rugs are soft yet strong, making them both comfortable and durable.
The Loren Rug features a traditional medallion and border motif in a warm neutral palette.
100% wool
Rug thickness: 0.4''
This rug is hand-knotted by artisans in India and may have slight variations in size and color
Shedding of loose fibers is normal with new rugs
With regular vacuuming shedding will diminish, typically within three to six months
No backing

Shedding of loose fibers may occur but will minimize over time. Vacuum regularly on a low power setting. Use a vacuum cleaner without a beater brush as it may cause damage. 
Remove spills immediately. If liquid, blot with a clean, un-dyed cloth by pressing firmly around the spill to absorb as much as possible. For hard-to-remove stains, professional rug cleaning is recommended.
Do not pull loose ends. Instead, clip them with scissors to remove.
Avoid direct and continuous exposure to sunlight. Rotate or reposition your rug every few months to promote even surface wear. 
Use rug protectors under the legs of heavy furniture to avoid flattening. 
Store your rug by rolling it front side out and wrapping in cloth for protection. Do not fold or store rug in an airtight plastic bag. Place it in a dry and well-ventilated space.

productDetails.productDetails:
• 100% wool
  • Rug thickness: 0.4''
  • This rug is hand-knotted by artisans in India and may have slight variations in size and color
  • Shedding of loose fibers is normal with new rugs
  • With regular vacuuming shedding will diminish, typically within three to six months
  • No backing

The Loren Rug features a traditional medallion and border motif in a warm neutral palette.
